title: Estimation of the final size of the COVID-19 epidemic
abstract: In this short paper, the logistic growth model and classic susceptible-infected-recovered dynamic model are used to estimate the final size of the coronavirus epidemic
twitter_description:
In this short paper, the logistic growth model and classic susceptible-infected-recovered dynamic model are used to estimate the final size of the coronavirus epidemic

### Competing Interest Statement

The authors have declared no competing interest.
